metadata.creator: Nintendo
metadata.description:
Available for 500 points from the Japanese Club Nintendo. Collection of ending and staff roll themes from various Nintendo games.

1.01: Famicom - Famicom Tantei Club Part II: Ushiro ni Tatsu Shoujo
Composition: Kenji Yamamoto

1.02: Game Boy - Kaeru no Tame ni Kane wa Naru
Composition: Kazumi Totaka

1.03: Super Famicom - Super Mario World
Composition: Koji Kondo

1.04: Super Famicom - F-ZERO
Composition: Naoto Ishida

1.05: Super Famicom - Super Metroid
Composition: Minako Hamano

1.06: Super Famicom - Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu
Composition: Yuka Tsujiyoko

1.07: Nintendo 64 - Super Mario 64
Composition: Koji Kondo

1.08: Nintendo 64 - Yoshi's Story
Composition: Kazumi Totaka

1.09: GameCube - Luigi's Mansion
Composer unknown (music by Shinobu Tanaka & Kazumi Totaka)

1.10: GameCube - Super Mario Sunshine
Composition: Koji Kondo

1.11: GameCube - Metroid Prime
Composition: Kenji Yamamoto

1.12: GameCube - Donkey Kong Jungle Beat
Composition: Mahito Yokota

1.13: DS - Daigassou! Band Brothers
Composer: Masami Yone

1.14: DS - Kawashima Ryuta Kyouju Kanshuu: Motto Nou o Kitaeru Otona no DS Training (Brain Age 2: More Training in Minutes a Day!)
Composition: Minako Hamano

1.15: DS - Sekai no Gohan: Shaberu! DS Oryouri Navi (Personal Trainer: Cooking)
Composition: Toshiyuki Sudo

1.16: DS - Zelda no Densetsu: Daichi no Kiteki (The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks)
Composer unknown (music by Toru Minegishi, Manaka Kataoka, Asuka Hayazaki, & Koji Kondo)

2.01: Wii - Zelda no Densetsu: Twilight Princess (The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess)
Composer unknown (music by Toru Minegishi & Asuka Hayazaki)

2.02: Wii - Super Mario Galaxy
Composition: Mahito Yokota
Performed by Mario Galaxy Orchestra

2.03: Wii - Wii Remote Controller Plus: Variety Pack (Wii Play: Motion)
Composer unknown (music and sound effects by Katsumi Yokokawa, Tomoya Tomita, Akihiro Juichiya, Hirofumi Taniguchi, Masanori Adachi, & Tomoko Sano; music by, CHAMY.Ishi, Toshiyuki Sudo, & Daisuke Matsuoka)

2.04: Wii - Zelda no Densetsu: Skyward Sword (The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword)
Composition: Mahito Yokota, Koji Kondo, Hajime Wakai, Shiho Fujii
Arranger unknown
Performed by Hyrule Symphony Orchestra

2.05: 3DS - Star Fox 64 3D
Part 1 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arrangement: Satomi Terui
Part 2 Composition: Satomi Terui

2.06: 3DS - Hirari: Sakurazamurai (Sakura Samurai: Art of the Sword)
Composer unknown (music by Toshiyuki Sudo & Daisuke Matsuoka)

2.07: 3DS - Mario Kart 7
Composer unknown (music by Kenta Nagata & Satomi Terui)

2.08: 3DS - Surechigai Densetsu II (Find Mii II)
Composer unknown

2.09: 3DS - Tobidase Doubutsu no Mori (Animal Crossing: New Leaf)
Composer unknown (music by Atsuko Asahi & Manaka Kataoka)

2.10: 3DS - Tomodachi Life
Composer unknown (music by Asuka Ito & Daisuke Matsuoka)

2.11: 3DS - The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D
Composition: Koji Kondo
Part 1 Arrangement: unknown (music by Mahito Yokota & Naoto Kubo)
Part 2 Arrangement: Naoto Kubo

2.12: Wii U - Pikmin 3
Composer unknown (music by Asuka Hayazaki, Atsuko Asahi, & Hajime Wakai)

2.13: Wii U - Donkey Kong: Tropical Freeze (Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze)
Composer unknown (music by David Wise; music/voice recording by Daisuke Matsuoka, Minako Hamano, Shinji Ushiroda, & Riyu Tamura)

2.14: Wii U - Famicom Remix 1+2 (NES Remix Pack)
Composer unknown
metadata.subject: Original Soundtrack
metadata.title: Nintendo Sound Selection [Ending & Staff Roll]
